TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit VectorStore extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class VectorStore Implements IDisposable
public ref class VectorStore abstract : IDisposable

Docs.summary: Represents a vector store that contains collections of records.

remarks.para: This type can be used with collections of any schema type, but requires you to provide schema information when getting a collection.
Unless otherwise documented, implementations of this abstract base class can be expected to be thread-safe, and can be used concurrently from multiple threads.

The record data model to use for adding, updating, and retrieving data from the collection.
Docs.param: The schema of the record type.
Docs.summary: Gets a collection from the vector store.
Docs.returns: A new instance for managing the records in the collection.
Docs.remarks: To successfully request a collection, either must be annotated with attributes that define the schema of the record type, or must be provided.
